channel.title: Ancient staff

item.title: Ancient staff
item.dc:creator: @Pirunigga Pirunigga
item.description:
@Pirunigga wrote:

ok anybody know how to make a ancient staff switch your magics to ancient when you wield it
ive tried things like if (ItemID != 4675 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] >= 0) { emotes = 2; updateRequired = true; setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); ancients = 1; sendMessage("You convert to ancient magic."); it says that it cannot find the sysmbol of itemID

Read full topic
